text:
[Starter]: Do you play any sports or keep active? Have you joined any teams or tried something new lately?

[Teacher]: time they would need to get up early for a morning class and work together so they could get to the top. (Italics mine) The response to the writer's question about their activity level is a lengthy and somewhat rambling response. While the writer attempts to share some interesting details about their own experience, the response also contains some irrelevant and overly complicated sentences. It can be interpreted as a mixture of bragging, boastful language, and an attempt to justify their presence on the team.

In general, both of these responses demonstrate the need for a clear and concise

If I hadnt been so busy with university studies, I probably wouldnt have met such great people and had such a great experience at university but I have to thank my university for all the benefits that I have gained so far because we have a great diversity of students from all over the world and everyone has their own story to tell. I have a great appreciation for the beauty of art and music in our lives with the use of a piano and a violin in many ways for many people in our community where there is a large cultural difference among people and there is a lot of music and art and I am eager to learn and explore these different cultures through the appreciation of art and music with a simple piano or violin and with the help of our ancestors and teachers, we have a lot to learn. I believe that the English Language Academy can provide its own unique set of tools and methods that can help to create the greatest of literary works and that these tools and methods can be adapted to suit the needs of the other countries that would like to develop their own academies.
